title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Designing Mobile-Based Collaborative Language Learning Intensive Short-Term Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can acquire at least three practical language expressions per week through 5-minute microlearning modules in mobile environments
Through collaborative activities (discussions, feedback), learners improve communication skills by interacting with peers and instructors at least twice weekly
In summative assessments (quizzes, assignments), learners demonstrate at least a 20% improvement in language proficiency compared to pre-course levels

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
